scripts.setup: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css resources/css && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js resources/js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js resources/js && cp node_modules/socket.io-client/dist/socket.io.min.js resources/js
scripts.clean: rm resources/css/bootstrap.min.css && rm resources/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js && rm resources/js/jquery.min.js && rm resources/js/socket.io.min.js
